TypeSignature.Value: public class MessageEnumerator : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System.Collections.IEnumerator
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageEnumerator extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.Collections.IEnumerator, class System.IDisposable
Public Class MessageEnumerator Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IDisposable, IEnumerator
public ref class MessageEnumerator : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System::Collections::IEnumerator

summary.span: 提供一个只进游标，用于枚举消息队列中的消息。

span.span: Provides a forward-only cursor to enumerate through messages in a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用与队列中的消息进行动态交互。Use for dynamic interaction with messages in a queue. 方法可通过类可以返回指向的消息队列或在给定时刻的快照的队列时包含副本的数组中的动态列表指定的方法调用。Methods available through the class can return either a pointing to a dynamic list of messages in the queue, or an array that contains a copy at a given instant - a snapshot - of the queue at the time the specified method was called. 与不同的是静态的快照，枚举数可以修改该集合。Unlike a static snapshot, an enumerator allows you to modify the collection. 使用、 可以从队列中删除消息和更改会立即反映在队列中。Using a , you can remove messages from the queue, and the change is immediately reflected in the queue. 一个枚举器不会从队列删除消息，当它查询队列时。An enumerator does not remove the messages from the queue when it queries the queue. 它将返回有关在当前光标位置，消息的信息，但它消息仍会保留在队列中。It returns information about the message at the current cursor position, but it leaves the message in the queue. A是光标，初始化为动态列表的开头。A is a cursor, initialized to the head of a dynamic list. 列表顺序操作在队列中，消息的顺序相同根据消息优先级。The list order is the same as the order of the messages in the queue, according to message priority. 你可以将光标移到队列中的第一个消息中通过调用。You can move the cursor to the first message in the queue by calling . 枚举数已初始化后，你可以使用转发逐步执行其余的消息。After the enumerator has been initialized, you can use to step forward through the remaining messages. 你可以指定是否要等待的消息变得可用，通过将传递到超时方法。You can specify whether to wait for a message to become available by passing a timeout into the method. 枚举数是动态的因为可以通过枚举器访问光标的当前位置 （例如，由于低优先级），之后追加一条消息。Because the enumerator is dynamic, a message that is appended beyond the cursor's current position (for example, due to low priority), can be accessed by the enumerator. 无法访问光标的当前位置之前插入一条消息。A message that is inserted before the cursor's current position cannot be accessed. 不能逐步向后与。It is not possible to step backward with a . 游标允许仅向前移动。A cursor allows forward-only movement. 方法使你能够将光标放回队列的开头。The method enables you to place the cursor back at the beginning of the queue. 实例为给定队列中独立工作。Instances of for a given queue work independently. 你可以创建两个将应用于同一个队列的实例。You can create two instances that apply to the same queue. 所做的更改，其中一个人员对队列中的消息将会立即反映在第二个枚举器中如果第二个枚举数定位早于第一个。The changes that one makes to the messages in the queue will be reflected immediately in a second enumerator if the second enumerator is positioned before the first. 但是，如果两个枚举器具有相同的位置，并且其中之一中删除该位置的消息，将引发异常如果其他枚举器尝试获取的值属性，现已删除消息。However, if two enumerators have the same position and one of them removes the message at that position, an exception is thrown if the other enumerator attempts to get the value of the property on the now-deleted message. > [!NOTE] > 如果你创建的实例与设置为`true`，没有其他应用程序可以修改你的枚举器中的消息，虽然有与队列连接。If you create an instance of with set to `true`, no other application can modify the messages in your enumerator while you have the connection to the queue. ## Examples 下面的示例获取队列中的动态列表的消息，并使用的所有消息进行都计数属性设置为。The following example gets a dynamic list of messages in a queue and counts all messages with the property set to . [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/CPP/mqgetmessageenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/CS/mqgetmessageenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/VB/mqgetmessageenumerator.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 释放与枚举数关联的资源。

span.span: Frees the resources associated with the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 光标的生命周期内，操作系统会保留到队列的打开句柄。The operating system retains an open handle to the queue during the lifetime of the cursor. 当你完成有关使用枚举器时，调用以释放与句柄关联的资源。When you have finished working with the enumerator, call to release the resources associated with the handle.

public: property System::Messaging::Message ^ Current { System::Messaging::Message ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取该枚举数指向的当前 。

span.span: Gets the current that this enumerator points to.
The current message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建枚举器时，它指向上第一条消息之前的位置的队列的开头。When the enumerator is created, it points to the head of the queue, at a location before the first message. 在这种情况下，无效，将引发异常，如果访问它。In this case, is not valid and will throw an exception if it is accessed. 必须调用将光标定位在队列中的第一个消息。You must call to position the cursor at the first message in the queue.

exception.span: 您在第一次调用 之前调用了 。

span.span: You called before the first call to .

exception.span: 游标位于消息枚举的第一个元素之前。

span.span: The cursor is located before the first element of the message enumeration.

span.span: You called after a call to had returned (indicating the cursor is located after the last element of the message enumeration.)

exception.span: 枚举数当前所指向的消息不再存在。

span.span: The message the enumerator is currently pointing to no longer exists.

exception.span: 可能已将其删除。

span.span: It might have been deleted.

summary.span: 获取用于浏览队列消息的本机消息队列游标句柄。

span.span: Gets the native Message Queuing cursor handle used to browse messages in the queue.
The native cursor handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含在枚举的本机句柄。This property contains the native handle to the enumeration. 当你完成有关使用枚举器时，调用以释放此资源。When you have finished working with the enumerator, call to release this resource.

exception.span: 此句柄不存在。

span.span: The handle does not exist.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用允许使用的资源可以重新分配用于其他目的。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 使枚举数前进到队列中的下一条消息。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next message in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: 如果当前队列中有下一条可用的消息，则使枚举数前进到该消息。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next message in the queue, if one is currently available.

returns.span: 枚举数成功地前进到下一条消息时为 ；枚举数已经到达队列的末尾时为 。

span.span: if the enumerator was succesfully advanced to the next message; if the enumerator has reached the end of the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载立即返回队列中是否存在任何消息。This overload returns immediately if there is no message in the queue. 没有等待指定的另一个重载到达的消息。There is another overload that waits a specified for a message to arrive. 如果因为队列为空，或者已经移动到集合中的最后一个元素以外，一条消息不是当前可用返回`false`到调用方法。If a message is not currently available because the queue is empty or because you have moved beyond the last element in the collection, returns `false` to the calling method. 创建后，枚举数从概念上讲位于之前的队列和首次调用的第一条带入视图您第一条消息的队列。Upon creation, an enumerator is conceptually positioned before the first message of the queue, and the first call to brings the first message of the queue into view.

exception.span: 引发了消息队列特定的异常。

span.span: An exception specific to Message Queuing was thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Function MoveNext (timeout As TimeSpan) As Boolean

param.name: timeout
param.span: 枚举数位于队列的末尾时，等待消息变得可用的 。

span.span: The to wait for a message to be available if the enumerator is positioned at the end of the queue.

summary.span: 使枚举数前进到队列中的下一条消息。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next message in the queue.

summary.span: 如果枚举数位于队列的末尾，则 将一直等到消息可用或给定 timeout 到期为止。

span.span: If the enumerator is positioned at the end of the queue, waits until a message is available or the given timeout expires.

returns.span: 如果枚举数成功地前进到下一条消息，为 ；如果枚举数已经到达队列的末尾，并且在 参数所指定的时间内没有消息变得可用，则为 。

span.span: if the enumerator successfully advanced to the next message; if the enumerator has reached the end of the queue and a message does not become available within the time specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载等待队列中没有消息时或如果游标到达队列的末尾。This overload waits if there is no message in the queue or if the cursor has reached the end of the queue. 如果因为队列为空，或者已经移动到集合中的最后一个元素以外，一条消息不是当前可用等待指定的超时。If a message is not currently available because the queue is empty or because you have moved beyond the last element in the collection, waits the specified timeout. 如果游标已在队列末尾仅返回`true`新消息到达时指定的时间间隔内，如果队列中当前的所有消息比优先级较低且位于队列的末尾。If the cursor is already at the end of the queue, only returns `true` if the new message arrives within the specified time interval, has lower priority than all messages currently in the queue and is placed at the end of the queue. 在队列中是否有其他消息，不带参数的重载将立即返回。An overload with no parameter returns immediately if no further messages are in the queue. 创建后，枚举数从概念上讲定位枚举，以及首次调用的第一个消息之前使到视图枚举第一条消息。Upon creation, an enumerator is conceptually positioned before the first message of the enumeration, and the first call to brings the first message of the enumeration into view.

exception.span: 为 timeout 参数指定的值无效。

span.span: The value specified for the timeout parameter is invalid.

exception.span: 它可能表示负数。

span.span: It might represent a negative number.

exception.span: 引发了消息队列特定的异常。

span.span: An exception specific to Message Queuing was thrown.

exception.span: 或

exception.span: 超时已过期。

span.span: The timeout has expired.

summary.span: 从队列中移除当前消息并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from the queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 移除消息即从队列中删除该消息。

span.span: Removing the message deletes it from the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些重载的描述的行为是适用才实例检索使用。The behavior described for these overloads is applicable only if the instance is retrieved by using the . 不要使用若要检索的实例为此方法已弃用。Do not use to retrieve an instance of as this method has been deprecated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent() cil managed

summary.span: 从事务性或非事务性队列中移除当前消息，并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from a transactional or non-transactional queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 对于消息到达队列的用时没有超时指定。

span.span: There is no timeout specified for a message to arrive in the queue.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除并返回消息在光标的当前位置。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location. 如果你使用的队列日志记录，删除消息会导致副本要保留在日记队列中，就像类的方法执行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 当删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 无需调用之后调用。You do not have to call after calling . 如果你对事务性队列中调用此重载，消息队列将创建单个内部事务。If you call this overload on a transactional queue, Message Queuing creates a single internal transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent(class System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction transaction) cil managed
Public Function RemoveCurrent (transaction As MessageQueueTransaction) As Message

param.name: transaction
param.span: 指定从中移除消息的事务的 对象。

span.span: The object that specifies the transaction in which the message will be removed.

summary.span: 从事务性队列中移除当前消息，并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from a transactional queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 对于消息到达队列的用时没有超时指定。

span.span: There is no timeout specified for a message to arrive in the queue.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除并返回位于光标的当前位置，使用由定义的内部事务上下文的消息`transaction`参数。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location, using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter. 如果你使用的队列日志记录，删除消息会导致副本要保留在日记队列中，就像类的方法执行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 当使用事务性队列时，事务的回滚会导致通过调用中删除任何消息要返回到队列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 删除不是不可逆的直到提交事务。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 当删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 无需调用之后调用。You do not have to call after calling .

exception.span: 参数为 。

span.span: The parameter is .

Public Function RemoveCurrent (transactionType As MessageQueueTransactionType) As Message

param.name: transactionType
param.span: 值之一，它描述与消息关联的事务上下文的类型。

summary.span: 从队列中移除当前消息并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from a queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 对于消息到达队列的用时没有超时指定。

span.span: There is no timeout specified for a message to arrive in the queue.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除并返回位于光标的当前位置，使用定义的事务上下文的消息`transactionType`参数。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. 指定`Automatic`为`transactionType`参数，如果已存在外部事务上下文附加到你想要用于接收消息的线程。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message. 指定`Single`如果你想要接收的消息作为单个内部事务。Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction. 你可以指定`None`如果你想要接收来自外部事务上下文事务性队列的消息。You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context. 如果你使用的队列日志记录，删除消息会导致副本要保留在日记队列中，就像类的方法执行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 当使用事务性队列时，事务的回滚会导致通过调用中删除任何消息要返回到队列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 删除不是不可逆的直到提交事务。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 当删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 无需调用之后调用。You do not have to call after calling .

exception.span: 参数不是 成员之一。

span.span: The parameter is not one of the members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除并返回消息在光标的当前位置。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location. 如果光标位于队列的末尾，该方法的此重载会一直等到有可用消息或指定的间隔`timeout`参数已过期。If the cursor is at the end of the queue, this overload of the method waits until a message is available or the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter has expired. 如果你使用的队列日志记录，删除消息会导致副本要保留在日记队列中，就像类的方法执行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 当删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 无需调用之后调用。You do not have to call after calling . 如果你对事务性队列中调用此重载，消息队列将创建单个内部事务。If you call this overload on a transactional queue, Message Queuing creates a single internal transaction.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除并返回消息在光标的当前位置。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location. 如果光标位于队列的末尾，该方法的此重载会一直等到有可用消息或指定的间隔`timeout`参数已过期。If the cursor is at the end of the queue, this overload of the method waits until a message is available or the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter has expired. 当使用事务性队列时，事务的回滚会导致通过调用中删除任何消息要返回到队列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 删除不是不可逆的直到提交事务。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 如果你使用的队列日志记录，删除消息会导致副本要保留在日记队列中，就像类的方法执行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 当删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 无需调用之后调用。You do not have to call after calling .

exception.span: 为 参数指定的值无效。

span.span: The value specified for the parameter is invalid.

exception.span: 参数为 。

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 超时已过期。

span.span: The timeout has expired.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType transactionType) cil managed
Public Function RemoveCurrent (timeout As TimeSpan, transactionType As MessageQueueTransactionType) As Message

param.name: timeout
param.span: 等待消息被移除的时间间隔。

span.span: The interval of time to wait for the message to be removed.

param.name: transactionType
param.span: 值之一，它描述与消息关联的事务上下文的类型。

span.span: One of the values, describing the type of transaction context to associate with the message.

summary.span: 从队列中移除当前消息并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from a queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 如果有要移除的消息，该方法将立即返回该消息。

span.span: If there is a message to remove, the method returns it immediately.

summary.span: 否则，该方法在指定的超时内等待新消息到达。

span.span: Otherwise, the method waits the specified timeout for a new message to arrive.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除并返回位于光标的当前位置，使用定义的事务上下文的消息`transactionType`参数。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. 如果光标位于队列的末尾，该方法的此重载会一直等到有可用消息或指定的间隔`timeout`参数已过期。If the cursor is at the end of the queue, this overload of the method waits until a message is available or the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter has expired. 指定`Automatic`为`transactionType`参数，如果已存在外部事务上下文附加到你想要用于接收消息的线程。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message. 指定`Single`如果你想要接收的消息作为单个内部事务。Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction. 你可以指定`None`如果你想要接收来自外部事务上下文事务性队列的消息。You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context. 如果你使用的队列日志记录，删除消息会导致副本要保留在日记队列中，就像类的方法执行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 当使用事务性队列时，事务的回滚会导致通过调用中删除任何消息要返回到队列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 删除不是不可逆的直到提交事务。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 当删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 无需调用之后调用。You do not have to call after calling .

exception.span: 为 参数指定的值无效。

span.span: The value specified for the parameter is invalid.

exception.span: 超时已过期。

span.span: The timeout has expired.

exception.span: 参数不是 成员之一。

span.span: The parameter is not one of the members.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 重置当前枚举数，使其指向队列开头。

span.span: Resets the current enumerator so it points to the head of the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个枚举器只能在一个向前方向移动。An enumerator can only move in a forward direction. 使用此方法重新开始在队列的开头。Use this method to start over at the beginning of the queue. 在调用，游标将指向第一条消息。After calling , the cursor points to the first message. 不需要调用之后调用将光标向前移动到队列中的第一个消息。You do not need to call after calling to move the cursor forward to the first message in the queue.
